Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Model of a cup
Description: Small oval-shaped jar with a wide restricted mouth and a flat base with a small diametre. The walls of the vessel are thin and end in a simple lip, which is emphasised by an incised horizontal line on the exterior. The vessel is brown in colour but bears a few black patches due to firing conditions. The interior bears several accumulations of clay and finger prints.
